description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Brighten up your T.V. this Christmas with our musical advent calendar, featuring 3 advent calendars, puppies, kittens and cartoon pictures all whilst listening to some all time favourite Christmas songs
